uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.editors.mail

Interface MessageProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMessageHandlerFactory.Provider, MessageData, MessageDataObject

    public interface MessageProvider
    This interface indicates an object that stores a MimeMessage In addition to get/set methods for the MimeMessage there are also accessor functions for top-level metadata like subject. This is to allow a 2-level implementation with a lightweight top level object only containing the metadata and a larger underlying object that is only accessed if the full message is required. The use of an interface also makes it easier to re-use code for different storage locations.
